author: Source: Borehamwood and Elstree Times
title: Heather Watson wins tough first round match in Hong KongBritish... - Borehamwood and Elstree Times
text:
British number two Heather Watson had to battle through three sets to beat China's Kai-Lin Zhang in the first round of the Hong Kong Open. Watson dropped her serve three times as Zhang took the opening set 6-3 despite not serving her first ace until the third game of the second set - in which Watson nevertheless broke to take the lead.
 Borehamwood and Elstree Times.
